page.title: 06NORTH WITHAM 2
page.content: moment. This house used to belong to Sir Isaac Newtons mother.In this village there are about 62 houses which are bungalows, Manor and farm houses . The village has one local shop called 'J.Brydens' which is run for charity for the church and blind people. This village church is the oldest building in the village and is mentioned in the original Domesday book.Through the village runs the River Withem and at the Nothern end of the village their is a ford. Almost all the land on my two squares is arable farming land, some beef cattle and sheep are grazed in the fields near the river which is often flooded. Near the crossroads is the village hall.
